name: digital-marketing-pro
description: Comprehensive digital marketing execution system with 25 specialist agents, brand guidelines enforcement, adaptive scoring, MCP integrations for your own marketing accounts, and persistent campaign memory. 16 integrated modules covering strategy, execution, and measurement across all channels, business models, and industries. Full execution layer with human-in-the-loop approval workflow. Agency operations: multi-client credential profiles, portfolio dashboards, SOPs, team management. 115 slash commands for direct workflow access. 143 reference knowledge files powering deep domain expertise. Agents call 64 Python scripts for deterministic scoring, query 67 MCP servers for live data and execution, enforce brand guidelines, and persist campaign learnings across sessions. v2.2.0 adds: comprehensive evaluation/QA layer (hallucination detection, claim verification, output validation, composite scoring with A+ through F grades, quality regression tracking, prompt A/B testing, eval-before-publish gates), and full multilingual support (4 translation MCP servers including Sarvam AI for 22 Indic languages and DeepL for European/CJK, automatic language detection and service routing, translation quality scoring, transcreation workflows for emotional content, cultural adaptation framework, multilingual SEO with hreflang auditing, and RTL support).
